opportunity_cost.gloss: the value of the next best alternative that is given up

scarcity.gloss: the condition of limited resources and unlimited wants

supply_function.gloss: the relationship showing how quantity supplied changes with price
supply_function.exec: lambda a, b, P: a + b * P

demand_function.gloss: the relationship showing how quantity demanded changes with price
demand_function.exec: lambda a, b, P: a - b * P

equilibrium_price.gloss: the price at which quantity supplied equals quantity demanded
equilibrium_price.exec: lambda a_s, b_s, a_d, b_d: (a_d - a_s) / (b_s + b_d)

equilibrium_quantity.gloss: the quantity exchanged at the equilibrium price
equilibrium_quantity.exec: lambda a_s, b_s, P_eq: a_s + b_s * P_eq

elasticity_price_demand.gloss: the responsiveness of quantity demanded to a change in price

elasticity_price_supply.gloss: the responsiveness of quantity supplied to a change in price

total_revenue.gloss: the total income from selling a good or service

marginal_revenue.gloss: the additional revenue from selling one more unit

total_cost.gloss: the total economic cost of production

average_cost.gloss: the cost per unit of output

marginal_cost.gloss: the additional cost of producing one more unit

profit.gloss: the difference between total revenue and total cost

gdp_expenditure.gloss: the total value of goods and services produced in an economy
gdp_expenditure.exec: lambda C, I, G, NX: C + I + G + NX

gdp_income.gloss: the total income earned by factors of production
gdp_income.exec: lambda w, r, i, p: w + r + i + p

inflation_rate.gloss: the percentage increase in the general price level

unemployment_rate.gloss: the percentage of the labor force that is unemployed

money_multiplier.gloss: the factor by which deposits expand in the banking system

present_value.gloss: the current value of a future payment
present_value.exec: lambda FV, r, n: FV / ((1 + r)**n)

future_value.gloss: the value of a present amount after interest accumulates
future_value.exec: lambda PV, r, n: PV * ((1 + r)**n)
